title: Full Throttle~!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka! L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Haruka-chan is so cute!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah, yeah! She’s the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I wanna see Haruka-chan perform again!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>They said she’s going to be on stage again soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Oh, then I want to practice saying “Lovely Haruka!” before that. Kanata-chan, teach me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, this requires a bit of artisanal skill. There are emotions we want to convey in each and every word, right? And cheerleading is all about blending those emotions... But Emma-chan! You’re enthusiastic, aren’t you!? If that’s the case, Kanata-chan will teach you!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yes! I want to learn! But is it okay for Kanata-chan not to take a nap today? Do you want to rest your head on my lap a little?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hehehe, Kanata-chan is at full throttle today, so no need for a nap! Now Emma-chan, we don’t have much time until the next stage, so let’s practice right away! L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>L-O-V-E, lovely Haruka-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
